name: July
lyrics: sits down, watches his favorite channel
sunlight comes through the window
every day, as usual
freedom, all day for his own using
it has the best of mending
away from the wrong-time-sleeping
silent
turns off all the volume
with the cigarette fills up his mouth
he needs no talk
stays on
chooses to mist him up
only the birds can figure him out
he's alone, alone
lay down, after the busy working
things are on her order
some kind she used to be
'cafe', there's no one who sits with
he could see her 'unhappy,'
he used to know what it means
breathing
this is the only way out
dropped the eyes to listen the exit runs
portrait
breaks from the wall and melts down
like the expressions fade and fall, fade and fall
it wakes me up
it wakes me up
it wakes me up
it wakes me up
rain stopped
still the fog is so heavy
in another world it fled again
from my hand, again
clock stopped
I had outwalked the stars
with the quiet steps and my heart
am I alone
am I alone
alone

江水漸寒 誰守烏蓬衣帶 漸寬
山盟已遠 塵緣已淡
把酒可伶 還悲秋扇
淚痕未幹 對鏡方知病魂 未散
紅箋依舊在 紅顏隔千山
此生多輾轉 忍看兵荒馬亂
教兒女情短 教飲恨裝歡難
共春宵賭書 填詞撥弦
最後悔當時都 惘然

name: 姑息
lyrics: **寵乘 (ting-sing) (姑息)
(Verse1)
下暗註定無眠
(今夜註定睡不著)
看到你早死ㄟ身軀
(看著妳早夭的身軀)
竟然不知 應該按怎措辭
(我竟不知應該如何措辭)
我甘願相信 你是完成
(我寧願相信 你是完成)
人間的輪迴
(人間的輪迴 )
重新倒轉
(重新回歸)
充滿糖仔 七逃物的天堂
(充滿糖果玩具的天堂)
繼續你 未完ㄟ路
(繼續 妳未走完的路)
(Chorus)
這是瀆職
(這是瀆職)
你用細樣的身軀
(你用嬌小的身軀)
恬恬抗議
(默默抗議)
咱ㄟ寵乘(ting-sing)
(我們的姑息)
(Verse2)
但是我猶原無眠
(但我依然無眠)
看到你早死ㄟ身軀
(看著你早夭的身軀)
竟然不知 應該按怎措辭
(我竟不知應該如何措詞)
袂赴 跟你說
(來不及告訴妳 )
人間的良善
(人間的良善 )
給你面對
(讓你面對 )
世間人都挫ㄟ運命
(世人都顫抖的命運 )
繼續你未完的路
(繼續你未完的路)
(Repeat Chorus)
(Bridge)
面對你的質問
(面對你的質問)
是的 咱ㄟ不對
(是的 我們錯了)
咱應該給你的日頭光
(我們該給你的陽光)
煞只剩
(卻只剩下)
滿天ㄟ細雨
(漫天的細雨)
但是請重再相信咱
(但請再次相信我們)
這滿天ㄟ細雨
(這漫天的細雨)
會放佇心頭內面
(會放在心上)
親像烙印 (lo-in)
(如同烙印)
等到日頭光
(直到 陽光)
重再轉來
(再次回來)
(Repeat Chorus)  x3

lyrics: time was the turn you didn't take
time was the choice you couldn't make

kids who made it through the night

we used to sing a different song
time was the words you didn't say
time is the maze you can't escape
where's the way to make it right?

lyrics: running through life

searching for anything

show you the meaning of life
something to live by
when all your days go by
when all your days go by
Everest will fall, aeons gone
wondering what in life carries on
at the end of the day, faces fade away
if this is goodbye, sing your song
lost in the crowd
stumbling, scrambling
trying to climb
out of this everyday timeline
place where the birds fly
when all your days go by
(story left behind)
with pages yet to write
deep in the night
you lie there alone with your eyes opened wide
watching the years as they pass by
someday you'll be gone
now coping with fear
you raise up your hand write your name in the air
paint all the people you hold dear
till all can hear your song
till all can hear your song
like a child in the rain
searching for anything
like a child in the rain
searching for anything

the villain or the knight
make up your mind

no turning back
and now the sun sets another day
a single flower starts to burn
with an envelope that's wavering beside
so I will count to ten

in this envelope here

and the world keeps spinning
sundial rewinds
as the scene repeats again
in a dream of mine
through the grains of time
I see you
did he take too long?
dancing in time... going round
all the words were left unspoken
promises too soon forgotten

when the time comes

past mistakes in time forgiven
everything will once again repeat
so when the time comes
two fates collide
on a summer day
lifetime held tight
as the scene repeats again
through the grains of time
